alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 10 at 4:00AM MDT until April 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM Today for gusty winds and low humidity value for fire weather zones 221, 222, 224 and 226 through 233, which includes the San Luis Valley, Fremont County, Teller County, the I-25 corridor, and Crowley, Otero and eastern las Animas counties... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Monday afternoon and evening for for gusty winds and low humidity value for fire weather zones 227...228...229...230...231...232...233...233 and 237...which includes most of the eastern plains on southeast Colorado... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening for for gusty winds and low humidity value for fire weather zones 228...229...230...231...232...233...234... 235...236...and 237 which includes most of the eastern plains of Southeast Colorado... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday afternoon through Monday evening. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 237. * Winds...South 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Timing...Monday afternoon and Monday evening and from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening...
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
